title: Font used for these numbers
content:
I am very bad with identifying fonts based on numbers but was hoping someone could point me towards a font that has numbers that resemble the 50 in this image

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080316010029im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Halb50logo2_6045.gif)

 [‹ Supa Funky](http://web.archive.org/web/20080316010029/http:/typophile.com/node/43172 "Go to previous forum topic") [cartoonish font ID ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080316010029/http:/typophile.com/node/43174 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Capnhud

comments.content:
It’s an italic Garamond of some kind.

Probably one of the more common varieties. I’d bet on Adobe Garamond Bold Italic or ITC Garamond Book Italic.

Looks pretty close me. Never would have guessed correctly on that one. Thanks for the ID.

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_  
I know I am in my own little world, but its ok. They know me here
